author: sky.cactus
content: The spec there is incomplete and not fully validate against all clients.  For the engine API, we should make sure the spec *is* complete since it is critical infrastructure (unlike JSON-RPC stuff which is non-critical).

author: sky.cactus
content: So if you see something missing, feel free to submit a PR to fix it!

author: sky.cactus
content: Ideally, test against all the clients to validate they all return the same thing, but I think at the moment just getting *something* in is valuable, and then we can iterate on client differences leading up to the merge.
